refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns as a string the date and time specified.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns as a string the date and time specified.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: itime -- the time is seconds since the start of the epoch. If omited or negative the current time is taken.
Sir -- the date and time as a string.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the dates opcode. It uses the file dates.csd.
